pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, October 19, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, October 19 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.


Media Appearances

6:00 a.m. ET  Interview with Raymond Filion for TVA Nouvelles will be posted to tvanouvelles.ca at 6:00 AM, and be broadcast on LCN and TVA throughout the day.

7:37 a.m. ET  Interview with Anna Maria Tremonti for CBC’s The Current – Live

8:30 a.m. ET  Interview with Kevin Frankish for Breakfast Television Toronto – Live

8:40 a.m. ET  Interview with Joanne Vrakas for Breakfast Television Montreal – Live

8:50 a.m. ET  Interview with Ted Henley for Breakfast Television Calgary – Live

9:00 a.m. ET  Interview with Riaz Meghji for Breakfast Television Vancouver – Live


PMO Media Relations: 
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
